value.title: Tooltips, tooltips, tooltips in Power BI
value.excerpt: In this video, Patrick shows how you can display multiple values within a tooltip for a visual. He walks through the DAX measure and also shows some pitfalls to look out for when it comes to filter context.  Go here for the sample DAX statement: https://guyinacube.com/2017/06/tooltips-tooltips-tooltips-power-bi/

value.excerpt: Wil Reynolds asked an awesome question about how to use multiple URLs with the web from example Power BI feature. The magic is with Power Query functions and parameters. value.title: Using Power BI reports from an end user perspective (2021)
value.excerpt: Just an end user of Power BI? Consuming reports and not authoring at all? Adam walks through how to navigate and use Power BI reports. Jump in and get familiar with reports in Power BI!  Reports in Power BI https://docs.microsoft.com/power-bi/consumer/end-user-reports  View a report in the Power BI service

value.title: What the HECK is a Power BI Gateway Cluster?

value.title: Why and how to use data protection in Power BI
value.excerpt: Data protection in Power BI can help you to prevent data leakage and have confidence in your data approach. Adam explores the data protection capabilities within Power BI using security labels and cloud app security.  Data Protection documentation overview https://docs.microsoft.com/power-bi/admin/service-security-data-protection-overview

value.title: How to Show Items with No Data in Power BI (e.g. Show All Month Names)
value.excerpt: Sometimes the default behavior in Power BI can be frustrating. For example, if you are showing month names, you may see that if no data is available then those months may not be shown in your Chart or Table. Often, you would want all months (Jan-Dec) to be shown, regardless of whether data is present

value.title: Age Calculation in Power BI using Power Query
value.excerpt: Power Query has a simple way of calculating the age. However, because DAX is the popular language in many calculations in Power BI, many are not aware of this function in Power Query. In this video, I am going to show you how easy is to calculate Age in Power BI using Power BI. This method is very useful

value.excerpt: In the previous video, I explained how you can use GROUPBY function in DAX to create an aggregated table. value.excerpt: There are many scenarios that you might want to implement a conditional expression. value.title: Customer Retention in Power BI   DAX Measures
value.excerpt: Customer retention is one of the most common scenarios of data analysis, which is very useful for business.
